letters.description: Guiding the client into a deep hypnotic state of physical relaxation and heightened subconscious receptivity.
Directing the client to witness past life memories as a neutral observer to establish historical and identity context.
Exploring pivotal life events and soul contracts to identify the origin of current emotional or spiritual blocks.
Addressing and reframing unresolved karmic patterns, debts, and unfinished business from previous incarnations.
Facilitating the emotional and energetic discharge of stored trauma and cellular memory carried from the past.
Anchoring the wisdom and healing gained into the current life for functional, long-term psychological transformation.
